summary.title: Prospects Flow
summary.description:
Lambda function

We share api gateway webhook details to Amma Client application, by creating Custom domain in Aws API gateway and create C name records in GoDaddy, and share those webhook details to Amma client. So whenever we submit Prospect by entering client details phon number, name at the client agent end using amma client application, It will send data to our Api webhook, once its received the Lambda will store the data to RDS server. 

We use Regional API, VPC for lambda, Subnet, RDS,

Note: Components
AWS Lambda - subnet is private, but Security group allowed All traffic in inbound
AWS RDS - Public Accessible is Yes, but security group is restricted. 
Zendesk - Public SAAS solution
Ameyo Call center App - Hosted in On prem server - It is in public. 
Go Daddy

a ) Lambda 1. First - Logs the prospects request, angaza sends the data and it just saves the all the datas to RDS,  Note: (RDS setting publicly accessible - yes, but security group is restricted by adding specific IP's)

b). Lambda 3,  Create Zendesk ticket using Token and upload Basic details to ameyo using Ameyo basic authentication using lambda.

c) Some of Data is uploading to AWS S3 bucket
